UnitInfo.Civilopedia: Os-Gabella's distrust to males was reflected in the entire Sheaim beaureaucracy. While there were males in position of powers, none were involved in Os-Gabella's inner circle. All males, no matter how powerful he was, also subjected to the inquiry, and often wrath, of Os-Gabella's personal guard. That these women possessed magical resistance helped them in controlling the males, who often relied to arcane powers.
Elites among Sheaim magocracy, the Emyrs were feared more because of their arcane prowess instead of their physical strength.
UnitInfo.Strategy: Use the Emyrs to summon endless Spectres for your armies.

UnitInfo.Civilopedia: Males unlucky enough to gain ire from Os-Gabella or her virgin guards were made into Thralls. These Thralls hosted a demon egg inside their bodies. Whenever a Thrall involved in combat, there is a good chance that the demon will spawn, transforming the Thrall into a Soulbound Demon.
Born from demon egg planted in a Thrall's body, these demons are the shock troops of the Sheaim.
Trained in the dark arts of Necromancy, Sheaim arcane practicioners wield unrivaled unholy powers in battle.
Trained in the dark arts of Necromancy, Sheaim arcane practicioners wield unrivaled unholy powers in battle.
Trained in the dark arts of Necromancy, Sheaim arcane practicioners wield unrivaled unholy powers in battle.

UnitInfo.Strategy: Matagots are the shock troops of various Demon lords. While their strength are not particular, they are many and eager to join a battle.
UnitInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Build [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Planar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] in a city to attract Matagot from beyond the veil.
[ICON_BULLET]Build [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mage Guild[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Planar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] in a city to attract Succubi from beyond the veil.
[ICON_BULLET]Build [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Temple of Veil[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Planar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] in a city to attract Tar Demons from beyond the veil.
[ICON_BULLET]Build [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Noble District[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Planar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] in a city to attract Minotaurs from beyond the veil.

UnitInfo.Strategy: The Colubra demoness' presence indicates Ceridwen's Blessing in a cause.
UnitInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Build [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Obsidian Gate[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Planar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] in a city to attract Colubra from beyond the veil.
[ICON_BULLET]Build [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Infernal Effigy[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Planar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] in a city to attract Manticores from beyond the veil.
